chapter.title: Installation
chapter.para: This chapter covers the installation of &PRODUCT; on various operating systems, including GNU/Linux, and Microsoft Windows.

important.para: To run &PRODUCT; on your system, a working installation of Perl is required, version 5.8.8 or higher.
